newGift.text1: Use the NEW GIFT SUGGESTION button to show what you have bought instead of the girls' gift wishes or what you would like help buying. Gift suggestions are displayed under the girls' gift wishes.
newGift.text2: REMEMBER !! You can always change the content by pressing the gift suggestion and selecting the Change button
newGift.text3: NOTE !! The girls can not see these gift suggestions or what else you write of comments on the page

newFeatureText.text1: The girls are working on coming up with the most exciting wishes ðŸ˜€
newFeatureText.text2: If you can't find anything in the list to give them, it is now possible to write what you would like to buy and get others to help.
newFeatureText.text3: Click on the Wishing List below and find the 'New Gift suggestion' button.
newFeatureText.text4: NOTE !! The girls can't see these gift suggestions or what else you write of comments on the page

tooltip.changeName: Change this name -  which is only used in comments and gift-suggestions
tooltip.changeStatus: Tap status to change. Used to signal what you want to do with the gift.
